description:
Description : "In his house at R'lyeh, dead Cthulhu waits dreaming..."
The Greater Cthulhu Mythos based on information from works in the Mythos. By default, all information is to be assumed to derive from the Lovecraft Myth Cycle unless otherwise marked.
